teacher_info.teaching_style:
I would love to ask you questions about everything and let you practice! We could manage, what kind of feedback you find acceptable and if you want to have something like homework (like listening to podcasts or reading articles) or not :)
If you need help with proofreading your texts, I would love to spend time during the lesson speaking about your texts and explaining my corrections/suggestions.

course_info.trial_description: This lesson is supposed to be our first chat about your goals in learning Russian and your interests. :)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson would be for you if you are interested in practicing your Russian with a native speaker. Topics, speed, and tasks depend on your goals. 
I provide extra materials, vocabulary, and a good mood after the talk :)

pro_course_detail.title: Proofreading session
pro_course_detail.description: If you need support by checking your texts for school, uni, or fun, I'll be happy to go through them with you and help to improve them!

teacher_info.intro:
Hey!
My name is Sveta. I was born in Siberia and lived there for many years. Now I live in Kaliningrad - the most not Russian city in Russia.

At an university I studied , psychology,  philology, linguistics, Russian and foreign literature, and then tourism and hotel management. I also have a diploma as a teacher of Russian as a foreign language.

I love traveling! Study  history and culture of different countries, communicate with people. That’s  why I love being a teacher. My students tell me about their country, and I tell them about Russia.
teacher_info.about_me:

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am very responsible and always carefully prepare for each lesson.
There is always a friendly atmosphere in my class and no pressure! It is important for me that every student feels comfortable.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lessons, we talk on a variety of topics, watch videos, listen to music and discuss art and literature. I think the only way to truly understand a language is through culture. But, of course, we study Russian grammar, modern vocabulary and even Russian slang.

course_info.trial_description:
A trial lesson is a great chance to get to know each other, define the goal and method of learning.
After booking a lesson, please message me and tell a little about yourself.

Пробный урок – это отличный шанс познакомиться, определить цель и способ обучения.
После бронирования урока, пожалуйста, напишите мне. Расскажите о своем уровне русского языка и цели обучения, чтобы я могла подготовиться к уроку.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian conversation practice/Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we will work to improve your vocabulary, listening and speaking skills. You will learn idioms, slang and phrases for everyday communication.
As a topic for discussion, we will use music, videos, texts, movies, TV shows, news and any topics that interest you!

На этом уроке мы будем работать над расширением вашего словарного запаса,  аудированием и навыками говорения. Вы изучите идиомы, сленг и фразы для повседневного общения.
В качестве темы для обсуждения мы будем использовать музыку, видео, тексты, кино, сериалы, новости и любые темы, которые вам интересны!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian course/Общий курс
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we will study pronunciation, grammar, train your listening, reading and speaking skill. Modeling of communicative situations will teach you to speak and understand Russian.
In the lessons, I use texts, pictures, audio and video content. You won't be bored!

На этом уроке мы будем изучать произношение, грамматику, тренировать аудирование, чтение и говорение. На примере коммуникативных ситуаций вы научитесь понимать, о чем говорят носители русского языка и грамотно поддерживать диалог.
На уроках я использую тексы, картинки,  аудио и видео контент. Тебе не будет скучно!

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! :) My name is Evgeniya. I am a Russian language tutor with funny and, at the same time, effective teaching style. 

I've been a language learner just like you! I learned French at school, now I speak English fluently. I lived in several countries and I’m passionate about different cultures and languages. Currently I’m living in Moscow, Russia.

*SCHEDULE*
I don't always have the opportunity to fill out a schedule here. Please choose a time that is convenient for you, I will confirm the lesson or suggest another time. See you in class!

My passion for the Russian language inspires students to learn more. I love what I teach!

teacher_info.teaching_style:

📌General Russian and Business Russian lessons are based on the modern textbook that guides for effective language teaching. I support individual learning needs and use relevant tutoring methods and materials. Lessons are fun with lots of videos, games and interesting topics.

♦ I will be sharing with you any useful links which could be helpful to you for improving your English.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian / Общий Русский / Орысша үйрену
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is suitable for anyone wanting to dive a little deeper into Russian language by learning not only how to communicate, but also how to do it professionally and with great confidence. We'll discuss various topics related to your needs and goals. 
During these lessons we will work on whatever you would like to focus on specifically whether it's Grammar Explanation, Vocabulary, Reading, Writing, Pronunciation hacks, How to write Business Emails, Speaking practice with Detailed Feedback and much more! We'll create a personal learning plan for you together! 

Этот курс подходит для тех, кто хочет немного глубже погрузиться в изучение русского языка, научившись не только общаться, но и делать это профессионально и с большей уверенностью. Мы будем обсуждать различные темы, связанные с вашими потребностями и целями.
Мы будем работать над тем, над чем вы хотели бы сосредоточиться конкретно, будь то Объяснение Грамматики, Словарный Запас, Чтение, Письмо, Советы по Произношению, как писать деловые электронные письма, Практика Устной Речи с подробной обратной связью и многое другое! Мы вместе разработаем для вас индивидуальный план обучения!

teacher_info.intro: Welcome to my lessons!  I am Anastasia. I am here to help you speak Russian confidently.  I have been teaching Russian as a foreign language since 2018. I am in love with languages and travels, in these reasons I spend too much time learning English, Farsi and recently Chinese. Almost every day I practice my teaching and community skills, learning modern and best methods. Looking forward to see you on my classes!

teacher_info.about_teacher: From my own experience I understand  how is difficult to learn a new language. I will do my best to help you with russian grammar and pronunciation. We gonna focus on reading, listening and speaking, analyzing daily conversations, funny stories and popular idioms. But if you have a request for a specific topic, let me know.

Only speaking practice 

- you can choose any topic for talking

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian course
pro_course_detail.description: Russian for your needs and goals. You gonna learn  grammar, pronunciation, vocabulary. We will also improve your speaking skills and reading.  If it’s necessary we can study alphabet and practise writing as well.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! My name's Andrea, I'm 28 and I live near Milan. I'm a polyglot, I actually speak 14 languages and I love traveling. I have a YouTube channel (@Poliglotta per passione) where I talk about my passion for languages. I work as a German teacher in a high school and I love getting in touch with people from different cultures. For this reason it'd be a pleasure to help you learning Italian, English or Russian.

Привет! Меня зовут Андреа, мне 28 лет, и живу в Италии. Я говорю на 14 языках и люблю путешествовать. У меня есть канал на YouTube (@Poliglotta per passione), где я рассказываю о своей страсти к языкам. Я с удовольствием помогу Вам выучить итальянский, английский или русский.
teacher_info.short_signature: A polyglot speaking 14 languages (including Russian, Spanish & German). Currently studying Farsi.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! My name's Andrea, I'm 28 and I live near Milan. I'm a polyglot, I actually speak 14 languages and I love traveling. I have a YouTube channel (@Poliglotta per passione) where I talk about my passion for languages. I work as a German teacher in a high school and I love getting in touch with people from different cultures. For this reason it'd be a pleasure to help you learning Italian, English or Russian.

Привет! Меня зовут Андреа, мне 28 лет, и живу в Италии. Я говорю на 14 языках и люблю путешествовать. У меня есть канал на YouTube (@Poliglotta per passione), где я рассказываю о своей страсти к языкам. Я с удовольствием помогу Вам выучить итальянский, английский или русский.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have experience as an English and German teacher for both adults and teenagers. As I have worked with people of different ages I tend to be very patient and curious about my students. Teaching is an awesome job that enables me not only to transmit my knowledge, but also to create a human relationship with another person. Do not feel afraid of making mistakes, I will not be mad at you: making mistakes is just part of the learning game!

У меня есть опыт работы в качестве преподавателя английского и немецкого языков как для взрослых, так и для подростков. Поскольку я работаю с людьми разных возрастов, я склон быть очень терпеливым и любопытным к своим ученикам.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I try to adapt myself to the requests and needs of the student. Lessons are generally held in Italian, especially if your native language is a Romance one (Spanish, French, Romanian, Portuguese...) or you already smatter the language. Using the target language during the lesson is a way to create exposure and fasten your progress. But if you do not speak any Italian at all, do not worry. I can speak English, Russian, German, Spanish and... many more languages to make you feel more comfortable!

Я стараюсь адаптироваться к запросам и потребностям ученика. Занятия обычно проводятся на итальянском языке, но я говорю также по-русски))

course_info.trial_description:
The trial lesson is a very important moment in which we can get to know each other and understand together what your aim is, why and how you want to learn Italian/Lombard/English. Do not worry, before we start I will PM you so to understand what do you actually expect and try to give you my best in these 30 minutes.
Trial lessons are also good if you just want to have a friendly chat with me about language learning :)

pro_course_detail.title: ITALIAN CONVERSATION 💬
pro_course_detail.description:
This course aims at developing or improving your skills in spoken Italian. We are going to talk together about different (and previously selected) topics, helping you to express yourself in the most correct way, just as a native speaker would do. Do not be afraid of making mistakes: they are just part of the learning process.

Цель этого курса - развить или улучшить ваши навыки разговорного итальянского языка. Мы будем говорить вместе на разные (заранее выбранные) темы, помогая вам выражать свои мысли наиболее правильным образом, как это делает носитель языка. Не бойтесь делать ошибки: они являются частью процесса обучения.

pro_course_detail.title: GENERAL ITALIAN 📚📖
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to learn Italian from scratch or improve your knowledge? Do you want to learn more grammar and develop all main skills (reading, speaking, listening, writing)? Then the General Italian course is what you probably need to start with! I will try to expose you to real content from Day 1 and you will be soon able to read Dante... or at least order a pasta in your favorite Italian restaurant ;)

Вы хотите выучить итальянский язык с нуля или улучшить свои знания? Вы хотите изучить больше грамматики и развить все основные навыки (чтение, разговор, аудирование, письмо)? Тогда курс общего итальянского - это то, с чего вам, вероятно, стоит начать! Я постараюсь познакомить вас с реальным содержанием с первого дня, и вскоре вы сможете читать Данте... или, по крайней мере, заказывать пасту в вашем любимом итальянском ресторане ;)

pro_course_detail.title: ENGLISH CONVERSATION 💬
pro_course_detail.description:
This is the right course if you would like to speak English and have a general conversation in this language. You can choose a specific topic (e. g. news) or just speak about whatever and have fun together. Don't be afraid of mistakes, it's part of the game :)

Это подходящий курс, если вы хотите заговорить по-английски и вести общий разговор на этом языке. Вы можете выбрать конкретную тему (например, новости) или просто говорить о чем угодно и весело проводить время вместе. Не бойтесь ошибок, это часть игры :)

pro_course_detail.title: LEARN ENGLISH WITH THE NEWS 📰🌎
pro_course_detail.description:
If you would like to expand your vocabulary, talk about the news and still improve your reading comprehension skills, this is the right course for you. Each lesson will be dedicated to a piece of news taken from online newspapers and we will, read it, translate it and talk about it.

Se volete ampliare il vostro vocabolario, parlare di notizie e migliorare le vostre capacità di comprensione della lettura, questo è il corso che fa per voi. Ogni lezione sarà dedicata a una notizia tratta dai quotidiani online: la leggeremo, la tradurremo e ne parleremo.

Если Вы хотите расширить свой словарный запас, поговорить о новостях и при этом улучшить навыки понимания прочитанного, этот курс Вам подойдет. Каждый урок будет посвящен одной новости, взятой из онлайн-газет, мы будем читать, переводить и обсуждать ее.

pro_course_detail.title: GENERAL RUSSIAN 📚📖
pro_course_detail.description:
Il corso perfetto per imparare il russo da zero insieme a un insegnante che può aiutarvi a uscire fuori dagli schemi della lingua italiana.

This is the right course if you would like to speak Russian and have a general conversation in this language. You can choose a specific topic (e. g. news) or just speak about whatever and have fun together. Don't be afraid of mistakes, it's part of the game :)

pro_course_detail.title: RUSSIAN CONVERSATION 💬
pro_course_detail.description:
Conosci già le basi di russo e vuoi solo fare un po' di conversazione? Questo è il corso che fa per te!

Do you already know the basics of Russian and just want to have a little conversation? This is the course for you!

Я родилась и выросла в России, в городе Сургуте (Сибирь), но сейчас живу в Санкт-Петербурге. Закончила педагогический университет на степень бакалавра по направлению Биологическое образование. 

Я очень открытый человек, люблю слушать и помогать людям, и хочу завести друзей в разных странах! А также хочу понять, как различаются наши культуры в глобальном и в повседневном смыслах.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Я как преподаватель сообщества прежде всего обеспечиваю своих учеников практикой разговорного языка. Я не стану ругать вас за ошибки – я сама являюсь учеником и знаю, как это порой бывает неприятно.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Наша основа – простой разговор! Беседы будут в своём темпе, о том, что вам интересно или непонятно, что удивляет вас или радует. Будет весело :-)

course_info.trial_description:
Rus/eng
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Пробный урок для студентов различного уровня!
На этом уроке мы с вами познакомимся, найдём удобные темы для разговора. Вы поймёте, хорошо ли вам со мной, ведь в этом и есть смысл индивидуальных занятий - мы ищем того, с кем нам приятно разговаривать! Если вы хотите, мы можем сделать наброски плана на дальнейшие уроки - ваши любимые темы для разговора или что-то, что вы 100% хотите обсудить на следующих уроках.

///

A trial lesson for students of various levels!
In this lesson we will get to know you, find convenient topics for conversation. You will understand if you are good with me, because this is the meaning of individual lessons - we are looking for someone with whom we are pleased to talk. If you want, we can sketch out a plan for further lessons - your favorite topics of conversation or anything that you 100% want to discuss in the next lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный Русский для начинающих (A1-A2) ||| Conversational Russian for beginners (A1-A2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Rus/eng
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Разговорная практика для начинающих.
Начать очень легко, не стоит бояться говорить! Поверьте, ваше знание языка куда выше, чем вы думаете. На наших уроках мы будем говорить на лёгкие темы: прошедший день, любимое хобби, любимое кино - никаких научных терминов или понятий. 
У вас всё получится!

///

Conversation practice for beginners.
It's easy to get started, don't be afraid to talk! Believe me, your knowledge of the language is much higher than you think. In our lessons, we will talk about light topics: the past day, favorite hobby, favorite movie - no scientific terms or concepts.
You will succeed!

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный Русский для студентов среднего уровня (B1-B2) ||| Conversational Russian for intermediate students (B1-B2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Rus/eng
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Разговорная практика для студентов среднего уровня.
Разговор обо всём и ни о чём - мы можем спокойно и свободно переходить из темы в тему, не опасаясь проблем и "слепых зон" - для этого и нужна практика! Ваш уровень позволяет нам говорить на более профессиональные темы, если вам этого захочется, или читать какую-либо литературу вместе.

///

Conversational practice for intermediate students.
Talking about everything and nothing - we can calmly and freely move from topic to topic, without fear of problems and "blind spots" - this is what practice is needed! Your level allows us to speak on more professional topics, if you like, or to read any literature together.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский для продвинутых (C1-C2) ||| Conversational Russian for advanced (C1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Rus/eng
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Разговорная практика для продвинутых
Мы можем говорить на абсолютно любую тему - профессиональную или обычную, читать литературу, стихи, рассказывать о каких-либо событиях в жизни, учёбе, работе. Постоянная практика - залог успеха и расширения границ знания языка!

///

Conversation practice for advanced
We can talk on absolutely any topic - professional or ordinary, read literature, poetry, talk about any events in life, study, work. Constant practice is the key to success and expanding the boundaries of knowledge of the language!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking practiсe/ Разговорный русский язык
pro_course_detail.description:
At this kind of lessons we will improve your speaking skills most of all. It would be a variety of teaching tools to help you with your aim (watching videos, descibing pictures, reading texts). 

На занятиях такого типа, в основном, мы будем развивать именно разговорную речь с помощью различных средств обучения (просмотр видео, описание картинок, чтение текста).

pro_course_detail.description:
At this kind of lessons for students who wants to improve grammar skills. We will discuss, do exercises. practise grammar in speaking and writing models. After each grammar topic you'll have a test out of lessons and feedback from me.

Такой тип уроков для студентов, кто хочет улучшить грамматику. Мы будем обсуждать, выполнять упражнения и тренировать грамматику в устных и письменных речевых моделях. После каждой грамматической темы вы будете проходить контрольный тест (вне урока) и получать от меня обратную связь.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Russian by films and cartoons/ Изучайте русский по фильмам и мультикам
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to improve Russian not only in grammar or vocabulary ways but with deep cultural learning book this course.  We will learn grammar, vocabulary, culture and we will improve listening, writing, speaking and reading. 

Если Вы хотите улучшить не только грамматику и лексику русского языка, но также через погружение в русскую культуру, то записывайтесь  на этот курс! Мы будем изучать грамматику, лексику, культуру, а также мы будем развивать навыки говорения, чтения, письма и аудирования.

pro_course_detail.title: Listening practice/ Развиваем навыки аудирования
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for students who want to improve their listening skills. We will start with listening separate sounds, combinations of sounds than words, combinations of words and sentences. And finally a text (monologues and dialogues) within communicative topics (the topic depends on students' level). 

Этот курс для тех, кто хочет улучшить навыки аудирования. Мы начнём с отдельных звуков, звукосочетаний, затем перейдём к словам, словосочетаниям и предложениям. И, наконец, потренируемся на прослушивании диалогов и монологов в рамках коммуникативной темы (тема зависит от уровня студента).

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Russian to get TORFL (TRKI) A1, A2, B1 /  Подготовка к сдаче ТРКИ на уровни A1, A2, B1
pro_course_detail.description: If you want to get Test of Russian as a Foreign Language (TORFL), schedule this kind of lessons. We will learn all parts of the test. You will have some trial tests (out of lesson time) and feedback from me.

pro_course_detail.title: Complexed lesson (reading, listening, writing, speaking)/ Комплексный урок
pro_course_detail.description: If you don't know (or want) to focus on only one part - reading, speaking, writing or listening, you may choose this kind of lessons. We will work with grammar, vocabulary within communicative topic using reading, listening, speaking and writing.

For complete beginners: please learn the alphabet before booking the lesson.

*** Rescheduling & Cancellation Policy ***
Please understand that when you miss a class that I miss the chance to have another student for that hour, and my time and money are lost. If you do not provide at least a 24 hour notice using the iTalki software to re-schedule the class then you will be asked to pay for the missed lesson.
You can read more about it here https://support.italki.com/hc/en-us/articles/360022945974-Rescheduling-Cancellations

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Emmy, I am from The Republic of Moldova and I speak Romanian and Russian fluently and consider myself to be of a C2 level in English. teacher_info.about_teacher: If I had to describe my teaching style, I would say it is based on motivating my students. I am very patient, driven and flexible. I have taught over a thousand lessons in English, Romanian and Russian and can say with certainty that the feeling I get when I see my students succeed is still as inspiring as it was on day one.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I love teaching - it is truly a passion of mine. I utilize various resources that allow students to acquire new vocabulary, practice pronunciation and fine-tune their conversational abilities.

I take a balanced approach to my instruction-style but in general, I try to maintain focus on the student ensuring that they get as much speaking time as possible. See you!!

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Russian in the fastest way possible
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
Want to go from no previous Russian knowledge to speaking Russian on an advanced level? 
This course is for students who want to practice their Russian with a native Russian speaker. An ideal introduction to the language and culture of Russia.

In this course, students will:
- The topics will vary according to the student's needs and interests.
- New and different topics for every lesson. It's important to be able to speak about a variety of different topics as it broadens your vocabulary and expression
- Guidance, support, and corrections are always given
- During the lessons the teacher will provide learning materials that will helt the student to acquire new vocabulary, practice pronunciation, and fine-tune their conversational abilities.

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Romanian in the fastest way possible
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
Get a solid foundation of the Romanian language before you take that trip to Romania. Master the basics of Romanian conversation the fun, fast, and easy way. Learn how to communicate fluently with a native Romanian speaker.

In this course, students will:
- You will start speaking in Romanian within minutes of our first lesson. 
- You will learn key vocabulary, phrases, and grammar in just minutes. 
- We will break down all the sentences, grammar, and more in a simple, easily understandable way!
- The topics will vary according to the student's needs and interests.
- Guidance, support, and corrections are always given

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversational Lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description: 
This course is intended for complete beginners (A1) and intermediate (A2) to (B2) speakers of the English Language. The lessons will focus on conversations about a wide variety of topics that would help a student become comfortable in speaking in English and carrying out basic conversations.

In this course, students will:
- Learn how to introduce themselves in English
- Learn basic English vocabulary
- Learn basic English grammar and pronunciation
- Learn the English alphabet 
- Learn useful phrases and sentences
- Be able to carry out simple English conversations

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Romanian Conversational Lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
Do you want to feel confident in carrying out conversations in the Romanian Language? Practice your language skills with a Native Romanian Speaker. This is a course focuses on practical conversations which will building your confidence and sharpen your language skills. This course will help you learn to communicate and understand basic information in order to confidently interact with people from Romanian-speaking countries, at work and in different social environments.

In this course, students will:
- You will get used to listening and speaking in Romanian and learn a lot of useful words and expressions commonly used in everyday life.
- The topics will vary according to the student's needs and interests.
- Guidance, support, and corrections are always given

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversational Lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
This is a course which focuses on speaking by building your confidence and your abilities.
By the end of the course, you'll be able to have a simple conversation with a native speaker on a variety of topics.

- The topics will vary according to the student's needs and interests.
- Guidance, support, and corrections are always given

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Focus on Grammar
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
This course is intended for intermediate (B1) and advanced (C1) speakers of the English language who want to increase their mastery of the English language. The lessons will include speaking or conversational practice, listening and comprehension, reading and comprehension, and writing activities.

In this course, students will:
- Learn advanced English vocabulary
- Obtain a deeper understanding of English grammar and pronunciation
- Understand sentence structures and the different parts of speech
- Carry out advanced conversations about topics which include: business, history, geography, poetry..etc.

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description: 
This course is intended for Intermediate (B1) to advanced (C1) speakers of the English language who are interested in enhancing their business vocabulary and professional grammar. 

In this course:
- The teacher will tailor the lessons according to the student’s professional learning requirements. 
For example: 
- For a student in the financial industry, the teacher can focus on financial terms, common expressions and metaphors used by people working in the field of finance.

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced Romanian
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
This course is intended for intermediate (B1) and advanced (C2) speakers of the Romanian language who want to increase their mastery of Romanian. The lessons will include speaking or conversational practice, listening and comprehension, reading and comprehension, and writing activities.

In this course, students will:
- Learn advanced vocabulary in Romanian.
- Obtain a deeper understanding of Romanian grammar and pronunciation
- Understand sentence structures and the different parts of speech in Romanian
- Carry out advanced conversations about topics which include business, history, geography, poetry...etc.

Learning Materials:
The teacher will provide learning materials in PowerPoint and PDF format.

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Course Description:
This course is aimed at Elementary Plus/Pre-intermediate students who would like to boost their understanding of Russian grammar. In this course we'll start with relatively basic grammar constructions, finishing with some complicated and often confusing grammar concepts.

- The course will involve both theoretical studies and a lot of speaking practice.
- The topics will vary according to the student's needs and interests.
- Guidance, support, and corrections are always given
- If you are unsure about your knowledge of grammar and would like a structured, systematic approach, this course will be ideal for you.

Learning Materials:
All study materials available come in PDF format

course_info.trial_description:
During the trial lesson, you will understand exactly what format of meetings awaits you. / Во время пробного урока вы точно поймете, какой формат встреч вас ждет. 

1) Listening to real Russian speech or watching a short video on an interesting topic, 2) Learning a few new words on the topic, 3) Practicing them in speech, 4) The "tell me about yourself" section, in which you share your opinion on the topic under discussion. / 1) Прослушивание реальной русской речи или просмотр короткого видео на интересную тему, 2) Изучение нескольких новых слов по теме, 3) Практика их в речи, 4) Раздел "расскажи мне о себе", в котором вы делитесь своим мнением по обсуждаемой теме.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice / Русский язык: разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
The focus of the classes is the training of speaking skills. It is useless to learn grammar rules without regular use in speech. My students immediately practice speaking, expressing their thoughts, using words and grammatical constructions to memorize them and speak calmly without looking at the notebook. / 

Фокус занятий - тренировка навыков говорения. Учить грамматические правила без регулярного употребления в речи - бесполезно. Мои ученики сразу тренируются говорить, выражать свои мысли, использовать слова и грамматические конструкции, чтобы запомнить их и спокойно употреблять, не подглядывая в свою тетрадь.

The material of our classes is real Russian speech. Russian Russian videos, textbooks and manuals on Russian as a foreign language from the best teachers of St. Petersburg and Moscow, texts from the Internet, magazines, social networks, as well as audio texts. I have prepared beautiful presentations for you, which will help us to spend our study time in an interesting way. / 

Материал наших занятий - живая русская речь. Русские русские видеоролики, учебники и пособия по русскому языку как иностранному от лучших преподавателей Санкт-Петербурга и Москвы, тексты из Интернета, журналов, социальных сетей, а также аудиотексты. Для вас у меня подготовлены красивые  презентации, которые будут помогать нам интересно проводить учебное время.

Мои ученики сразу же практикуются в разговорной речи, аудировании, выражают свои мысли, используя слова и грамматические конструкции, чтобы запомнить их и говорить спокойно, не глядя в тетрадь.

The material of our classes is real Russian speech. Russian Russian videos, textbooks and manuals on Russian as a foreign language from the best teachers of St. Petersburg and Moscow, texts from the Internet, magazines, social networks, as well as audio texts. I have prepared beautiful presentations for you, which will help us to spend our study time in an interesting way. / 

Материал наших занятий - живая русская речь. Русские русские видеоролики, учебники и пособия по русскому языку как иностранному от лучших преподавателей Санкт-Петербурга и Москвы, тексты из Интернета, журналов, социальных сетей, а также аудиотексты. teacher_info.intro:
Hello!
My name is Daria Potseluyeva, I teach Russian for foreigners.
This language has a special place in my life. Both grandmothers were teachers of Russian language and literature throughout their lives. From an early age, I was instilled with this special love. Now, jokingly, I call myself a "hereditary teacher."
In 2008, I received a higher law degree. I have been working in the field of business in Russia and Kazakhstan for more than 10 years, so I know well what lexical material is suitable for students studying a business language.
I love to travel (I have visited more than 30 countries), I love to cook and study the culture of other countries.
I will be glad to see you in class!

teacher_info.about_teacher:

Depending on the chosen goal (work, travel, social networking, reading literature in the original) and on the frequency of classes, I offer a training program that will be comfortable for you!

Write me and I can become your guide to the world of learning Russian!

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson, we will get acquainted and I will conduct a mini-version of the lesson in the direction you are interested in. You will be able to understand whether you like my teaching style, voice, pronunciation and approach to the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description: Practice speaking for any language level. I adapt to your language level. You can choose the topic of the future conversation in advance by informing me of your wishes. It can also be a spontaneous conversation, if you are more interested in it. At the end of the lesson, the student will receive a list of new words to study and an error analysis (if applicable).

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian
pro_course_detail.description: Business Russian will help you learn new words and expressions necessary for working with Russian partners or clients. I will introduce you to the ethics of business communication (correspondence, meetings). Depending on the chosen direction (construction, tourism, medicine, marketing, human resources, etc.), I will select materials and topics for study and discussion. The lesson can include talking, reading, listening and other ways of studying.

pro_course_detail.title: Learning to work with text (essay)
pro_course_detail.description: During the lesson, you will learn how to correctly build sentences, correctly express your thoughts. Depending on the chosen topic, learn how to describe situations using grammatical and stylistic constructions depending on your level. We will work out grammar and written speech, conversational practice and reading.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi. I'm Nastya. I'm from Belarus. Currently, I'm a university student who is studying the Manager of culture studies;
